title: SCP-001 (Lily's Proposal)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player. They will not die or receive any negative effects tonight. (3 uses)
- Halt all death for 24 hours. No one will die tonight or the coming day. You then die.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you die at night, the two players beside you will be unable to die the following that night and the following day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Save at least X players from death. X is the playercount divided by four and rounded.

desc:
Post 4386
*"SCP-001 will occur exactly 24 hours before the death of all life on the planet."*
